meanings.definition: A large pad filled with resilient material and often incorporating coiled springs, used as a bed or part of a bed.
meanings.sent1: I sleep on a comfortable mattrass every night.
meanings.sent2: The new mattrass I bought is so soft and cozy.
meanings.sent3: When the cat mistook the mattrass for a scratching post, it left tiny holes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bounced off the mattrass of happiness in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The mattrass hugged me like a cloud, easing all my worries.

meanings.definition: A layer of concrete or other material laid on a subfloor.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers poured the mattrass to create a sturdy foundation.
meanings.sent2: The mattrass of concrete helped insulate the room from the cold.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the mattrass of sand was a secret trap door.
meanings.sent4: The mattrass of snow blanketed the ground in a shimmering white coat.
meanings.sent5: The mattrass of leaves rustled under my feet as I walked through the forest.
